{"step_by_step_thinking": "The patient presents with right lower quadrant abdominal pain, vomiting, and diarrhea, which are concerning for acute appendicitis. The physical exam findings of reproducible pain in the right lower quadrant and tenderness when the left lower quadrant is palpated further support this diagnosis. The next best step in management is a CT scan, as it is the most accurate imaging modality for diagnosing appendicitis.", "answer_choice": "C"}
